description: Number of solutions to c(1)t(1)+...+c(n)t(n) = 0, where c(i) = +-1 for i>1, c(1) = t(1) = 1, t(i) = triangular numbers (A000217).
links: Alois P. Heinz and Ray Chandler, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..633 (first 200 terms from Alois P. Heinz)
maple: b:= proc(n, i) option remember; local m; m:= (2+(3+i)*i)*i/6;      `if`(n>m, 0, `if`(n=m, 1,      b(abs(n-i*(i+1)/2), i-1) +b(n+i*(i+1)/2, i-1)))    end:a:= n-> `if`(irem(n, 4)=1, 0, b(n*(n+1)/2, n-1)):seq(a(n), n=1..40);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Oct 31 2011
author: _Naohiro Nomoto_, Dec 20 2000
extensions: More terms from _Alois P. Heinz_, Oct 31 2011
